Package pgui.win

Class Window

java.lang.Object
pgui.Element
pgui.win.Window
Direct Known Subclasses:
ScrollWindow
public class Window extends Element
A Window is a class that contains a collection of 'elements' - other interface objects, such as buttons, text or other windows.
Version:
1.3
Author:
Jack Humphreys
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Window

      public Window(processing.core.PApplet applet, Palette cols)
      Used for main windows, with no parent window.
      Parameters:
      applet - A reference to the Processing sketch
      cols - The Window's colour palette

    • Window

      public Window(processing.core.PApplet applet, Palette cols, Window parent)
      Used for sub-windows.
      Parameters:
      applet - A reference to the Processing sketch
      cols - The Window's colour palette
      parent - The parent window within which the current window belongs to
